positioning.headline: Cut Spatial Analytics Costs by 50–90%
positioning.subheadline: Replace slow, fragile polygon-based pipelines with fast, deterministic spatial foundations that run natively in your existing data warehouse.

problemSpace.title: If This Sounds Familiar, We Can Help
problemSpace.intro: Most enterprise spatial analytics teams face the same expensive problems:
problems: Spatial queries that take 30–90 minutes force analysts to run batch jobs overnight instead of iterating interactively.
Cloud compute costs spike unpredictably ($20k-50k/month) because polygon operations don't scale in modern data warehouses.
Analysts avoid spatial analysis entirely because it's too slow, leaving valuable location insights unused.
Engineering teams spend days maintaining fragile spatial pipelines instead of building new features.
Leadership loses trust in spatial metrics when numbers don't match across different team queries or zoom levels.

valueProposition.title: What Changes with InsAct
valueProposition.intro: We rebuild your spatial data foundations so queries that took hours now run in seconds—on your existing Snowflake, Databricks, or BigQuery infrastructure.

benefits.title: Queries Become Fast
benefits.description: Spatial analysis runs in 2-15 seconds instead of 30-90 minutes. Analysts iterate freely instead of waiting for overnight batch jobs.

benefits.title: Costs Become Predictable
benefits.description: Eliminate specialized spatial databases. Run everything on standard compute. Monthly spatial costs drop 50-93%.

benefits.title: Results Become Reliable
benefits.description: Metrics are mathematically consistent across all queries and zoom levels. No more unexplained discrepancies or client escalations.

metrics.label: Query time for Census trade area enrichment
Spatial compute costs for daily foot traffic attribution
Reduction in storage costs for multi-resolution analytics
Timeout failures after migration from polygon-based approach

cases.title: Trade Area Enrichment with Census Data
cases.problem: 90-minute queries and multi-day data updates make iterative trade area analysis impossible.
cases.result: 2-5 second queries. Daily automated Census updates. Analysts iterate freely.
cases.why: Retailers can test multiple trade area definitions per day instead of abandoning refinement after the first pass. Location decisions improve measurably.

cases.title: Daily Foot Traffic Attribution
cases.problem: $36k/month in compute costs. 4-6 hour daily runs. Data arrives after campaigns end.
cases.result: 8-15 minute runs at $2.4k/month. Marketing teams optimize campaigns the same day.
cases.why: Real-time campaign optimization saves more than the entire spatial infrastructure cost. SLA breaches drop to zero.

cases.title: Multi-Resolution Spatial Analytics
cases.problem: 3 separate datasets create inconsistent metrics across zoom levels. Client trust erodes.
cases.result: Single dataset. Guaranteed consistency. 67% lower storage costs.
cases.why: Clients stop questioning metric accuracy. Support escalations drop. Contract renewals de-risk.

questions.question: Does this require rebuilding our entire stack?
questions.answer: No. We work within your existing data warehouse (Snowflake, Databricks, BigQuery). No new infrastructure required.

questions.question: Do we lose control of our data?
questions.answer: No. All data stays in your warehouse. You own the outputs. We provide methodology, not a black box.

questions.question: Are we locked into InsAct after the engagement?
questions.answer: No. We hand over production-ready datasets and full documentation. Your team can maintain it independently.

questions.question: Is this experimental or cutting-edge?
questions.answer: No. This approach has been proven at scale by Uber, Meta, and DoorDash. We've productized it for the enterprise.

model.title: 6-8 Week Proof of Concept
model.description: We use your actual data to validate 10x+ performance improvement and 50%+ cost reduction. Investment: $40k-$80k.

model.title: Success Criteria
model.description: You decide success metrics upfront (query time, cost, reliability). If we don't hit them, you don't move forward.

model.title: Full Handover
model.description: Production-ready datasets, methodology documentation, and team training. You own and maintain everything after.

shouldNotEngage.title: You Should NOT Engage Us If:
reasons: Your spatial queries already run in under 10 seconds consistently.
You're spending less than $5k/month on spatial compute and don't see it as a problem.
You need real-time streaming location data processing (we focus on analytical workloads).
You're looking for a dashboard or BI tool (we build data foundations, not UIs).

cta.description: Discuss your current spatial costs and see if we can reduce them by 50-90%.

meta.title: InsAct — Cut Spatial Analytics Costs by 50-90%
meta.description: Replace slow, expensive polygon-based spatial pipelines with fast, deterministic foundations. Proven results: 90min → 2sec queries, $36k → $2.4k/month.
